availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Henry County, Kentucky, native. Son of James Roberts and Catherine Roberts. Married to Caroline R. Casey Roberts in Trimble County, Kentucky, on March 4, 1855. Father of James M. Roberts. Resident of Trimble County in 1850. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District No. 2, p. 382B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 228.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Boone County, Marion, p. 183B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trimble County Marriages Film #, 000420391, p. 441 of 446 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Edward Newton Roberts (Birth-Death)," Memorial #70798707 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/70798707 (accessed October 19, 2020).
